p:
The coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) pandemic has caused massive disruption of travel along with other aspects of life. The travel industry is a major part of the global economy. With 1.5 billion international tourist arrivals in 2019, the travel industry is the world’s third largest export category and international tourism generated US$1.7 trillion exports in 2018 or nearly US$5 billion daily.
1 International tourism contributes immensely to global exports, accounting for 7% of global exports and 29% of the world’s services exports.
1 COVID-19 has dramatically affected the travel industry, and travel can help to vitalize economic recovery worldwide.
